title: Streets of Rage Remake 5.1 + 15 best mods
description:
STREETS OF RAGE REMAKE V5.1 + 15 BEST MODS

Genre: Beat'em up
Players: 1-2 or with CPU friend
Platforms: Windows 7 (32 bit), Windows 7 (64 bit), Windows Vista (32 bit), Windows Vista (64 bit), Windows XP
Manufacturer: Bombergames
Version: 5.1
Date Added: November 2014

Streets of Rage Remake v5.1 with all chars/cheats/extras unlocked
+ 15 best mods selected by Lune79. 

Game settings optimized to play with all PCs without problems.
Joystick for player 1 has been configured, enter BEFORE playing. 
Double click "SorR" icon and enjoy!


Streets of Rage Remake v5.1

Streets of Rage Remake is a side-scrolling fighter game, and what the authors call a "tribute" to the original saga of the Sega Megadrive/Genesis series.
If you've never played the original game, then it doesn't really matter: the plot is quite familiar.
A formerly happy city has been taken over by an evil crime syndicate, the police and city officials have all been paid off, and it's up to a small band of heroes to save the day.
Forget the standard storyline, though, the sheer scope of this project is what really matters.
The game includes 93 stages in story mode + 5 stages in extra modes, 40 cutscenes, 19 playable characters, 64 enemies and 8 different enemies, so there's plenty here to keep you entertained.
And the game rearranges the original storyline and level layouts, just a little, so even if you remember Sega's version, you'll still find a new world to explore here.
Version 5.1 is the latest and among the many corrections can play with the CPU on SorMaker and resume interrupted games thanks to a system of self-rescue.
In the game are unlocked all the characters, all the cheats and all the extras and are included the 15 best mod on SorMaker chosen by myself:

-A Syndicate Story
-Brutal Justice v1.0
-Double Dragon II Advanced Megamix
-H.U.N.T.E.R v1.1
-Path of Shadow Dancer
-Rescue Metro City
-SOR Metal Slug SE
-SOR Never Back Down
-SoR3 - Adam's Story - Extended
-SORR Gangs of Fury 1.2
-Streets of Rage Manhunt
-Streets of Rage Ultimate 1.1
-Streets of Rage Vendetta
-V4 Remake v1.4
-Way of the Warrior
